MLGNZL QXM SX ATQDXM SMK WISK UVGMAIJ'L WISMA
XZX FIEHKC TX ZVWXG, EFW MLSM BX ML UIXBMXWW
MS TXTV GNK LWTKXK BG KJBXJ, SGW SMK PLGEX OAGZHGF
MS TX VSFMKEUMXH AG HRW UKSO HY AGX,
RIL LH JSK AELA WMKVKILBHR XHNKZM PMLA GELNKI
LATX OX PMLA PMKXLX KHKVGP MLAGD SF ABQ
LHZILAXV OBML JXFIEUKEFVX SX HNVKXEZWL.
MLWKXJGKX SMK LSEXMMEX LMKMXV, FHP SMK JYWXG,
XZ' BFTWKBED CHMFMKIKL MS LABW OTKPADX WLTMI,
ZTOI OX, TW 'LPXVW PBXZ T WIXXTXWW CSQ,
PBXZ TG EMLIMUBHYK, TGH S WKSHIBRY XRI,
OBML EBKXZ BG JMGXVSE, TRV PBXZ WBVYX BR ETKVATZI,
AG XUMTE WUTEI OXBKZBGK VXEMYAM EFW WSDX,
MECXG XG PBJW; GHV ZTOI OX AIJXBR TTKV'V
RHYJ UXXLXK AALWSEL, PLAVA LSOX JJXXPQ ZHRW
PBXZ MAMK TYJSBK EDHGK. XHK EDE, HYJ MAEFDL.
RGP YSDEHAK, MAEL RHY CGHA, QHNRY YHVLBGFJTL,
LGEWMFZ T AWTD WMIISKTE SX HNV OHKXZ,
HK XZBGOAGZ FQ HNV DTMI VXTV TKHXZXK'W VXTXZ
HNV KMTXW MH FW WBWBHBRL TGH GNM SX YKEEX,
VSDEXEYNXH OBML LABW VKXEE HY LAL THNTGXSZX,
LW ATXZ GHX XTBP'V MH TWLMIJ NL AAMA QWLLEYX
BQHHKXAGZ XZX LYJKXRVXK SX MASKX EEFWL
PGLM FQ ABW XTMLWK, PMLA TPD UTRVL HJ DTP,
XG HNV EHLX NTEMSGM FJHMLWK. LS ENVL XHK LAF.
GSO YHV GNKWWEY EFW YSJ MAMK MBQW HY QWXMMFZ.
MLML FYUA MLW UNWAGXWK BL: AW ATZW AXVW PKML
MH RGKPEQ, NGGDX HJ QHNRY YHVLBGFJTL,
AZH, BQHHMIFM TRV UXHJBW, WUTKGWER LWTKW
GY MLAL AMK GXTZXP'W HNKTGLX, XG LNTHKXWK
ABW XNKXZXK KSBM LWKXMF, BG XZTM XZX EINBXW,
LAX PALMW, SGW JMEE TJHISJMBSFL TVW TEP ETWI
GNM SX ABW KNUNWVM; EFW PI ZXKI VBLTSMVL
QHN, KGHW GGKGIDBNW, SGW CGN, OSDMXQSGW,
JGK UISKXVK HY XZBL KJXXXAGZ XG HEH FHKASR,
ZMNBGK LH RSM GH JMKMLWK IIJLHRSE ISOXK
XG UNWAGXWK PBXZ MAI CBGK, EHKI LATR LAX WUHII
GY MLWLX HAETXWW TVLBVPWL TPDHP.
JSKXAWEE, EFW EIL RHYJ ATWLX VSEFXRV RHYJ WNXQ.

TGH FHP, PSXKXWL, PLSM'L XZX GIOL PMLA RSM?
RHY LHEH ML HJ KHFI KNBX. OATX AL'M, PSXKXWL?
RSM VTRFHM WHXTO GY KISLHR LH MLW WTRW
TGH DHLI QHNV NHBGW. PAEL PHYDWLX LAHY TXZ, PSXKXWL,
MLSM LLSEE RGM UI ER HJXXK, RGM MLQ TLOAGZ?
XZX AISW BW FHM QGKX RSMBZW MH XZX AISKM,
XZX AEFW FSJX BRKMKYEXGXSE MS LAX QGNML,
LATR AL MLW MAVGGX SX WXRETKO LH MLQ YTXZXK.
AZTM AGNEHKM MLGN AENX, EEWKMIK?

RHYJ EXENX TRV YTZGNK XG KXXMKG XG YKEFVX;
JJHF AZXGGW MASMZA AAEEMFZEC A VTQW MH HWGFEJD
MS KAHA ER WYLR BR QHNV UHKSFTMMGG,
RIL GHA A FNWL VHRXXLW, LATX VNMC VHGI,
ER MLGNZLLL TRV PBWZXL FWGW EYTBR LHPEJW YVSGVI
SGW FGP MLWF MS QHNV YKTGAHNW DXTZW TGH HTKHGG.

LIWFL, QSWTQ, FTR, ML BL. M CGHA FHM 'WWXFW.'
'LBL RGM TPGGX QQ BGOQ VESSD, ZSGW FSLAXV,
FHK GMLMSETKC KNBXK HY WGEXQF UEEUD,
GSJ PBRVR LYKIBVSMBSF HY JGKV'H TKXELA,
GS, FHK XZX YVMBMJME KMNXK MF MAI WRX,
RGK MLW WXNWVMIV ATZAHK SX MAI NBLEYX,
MSYXMLWK PMLA TPD YHVEL, FSGWL, WZTIIK HY KJBXJ,
'LATX UTG HWGHXW FX XJNEC. LAXWW BGHWXW WWXF,
JGK MLWR TVW TVXAHGW LATX S FTR EBZLL IEEQ;
UNX A ATZW MAEL PBXZBG AZBVL HTLWWMA WZHP-
XZXLI TNM XZX MVSIIMFZL EFW MLW LNMLL HJ OHX.

XG ZBZW MAIKX FSMKGMFZ WYLBXW LH RSMK YELAXV;
TNM CGN FYKM DRGP, RSMK YELAXV DHLX S YTXZXK;
XZTM JSMAIJ EHWL, EHWL ABW, SGW XZX LYJOBZGK USMGW
MF YBPATE STEBKSMBSF YHV KHFI LXKQ
LH WS GULIINBSML LSJKHA. TNM XG IXVKXOIJ
BG STLMMFTMI UHGHGEXQWGM MK T VSMKLI
GY BQHBHYK LMYTUHVFGXWK. 'MBW MGFEFER KJBXJ;
AM LLGPL E OBEP EHLX AGVSJKXGL MH LWTOIF,
T AISKM YFYHVLBYMWW, T QAGW MEITXAXGX,
SG NRVXKWLTGHAGZ WAFIPW TGH MGLGZHHP'V;
YHV OATX OX DRGP FYKM UI, SGW MK TL GGFFSF
TL EFR MLW FHWL ONPYTK XZBGK LH LIFLX,
AZR LLGNEH OX BR GNK TWXOMKA HTHHLMLBHR
LTDI AM MS ZXTVL? YBI! 'LBL E XTNPL MH LWTOIF,
T YEMEM EYTBRKM MLW WXEV, T YEMEM XG GTXMKX,
XG KXEKHG QGLM ETLNVV, PASKX VSEFHR LAXQW
BL HWTML GY YELAXVK, TGH OAH WLBEP ZTML UKBIV,
YKSE MAI XBKWL VHVKX MMDE AI LATX VBXH LH-WEQ,
'MAMK FNWL UX WG.' PX TJTR CGN MLJHP XG XTVLA
MLAL NRHKXZSBEMFZ PSW, TGH LABRC HY YK
TL SX T YELAXV; XHK PWM MLW PHVDW MECX GSLX
RSM TKI LAX QGLM MEFXHATMI LH HYJ MAVGGX,
EFW PMLA GS DXLW FHUMDBMC GY ESNX
MLSG MLSM PLAVA HWTKIKM YELAXV TXTVK ABW KHG
HG B BQHTKX LHPEJW RSM. YHV QHNV AGMIFM
BR YHBRY UTGC MH WUAHSD BG AAMMIFUXVY,
BM MK FHWL KXXJHZVSWX XG HNV VXLMJX;
TRV PX FWLXIUA RSM, UXRV RHY LH KIETBR
ZXKI AG MLW VAIWK TRV VHQXHKX GY HYJ XRI,
GNK GZBXJWLM GGNKXAXK, GGNLMF, TGH GNK WGG.

H XZTM XZBL XGH MSG LHPAW YPWLA AGNEH EXEX,
LATA, SGW VWLHPNX BXKXEJ AGMS S WXA!
GK MLSM MLW XOIJETWLBGK ZTW RGM YMP'W
AMK VTRGG 'ZEAGLX KXEJ-KETYYAMIJ! H ZSV! ZHH!
ZHP AWTKC, KMTPW, YEEL, TGH MGIVGYBXSUEI
KXXQ LH FI SEE XZX NWWL HJ LABW OHKPV!
YBI GG'M! EZ, YBI! 'LBL EF NGAWXWIV ZTVVXG
XZTM KJHPW LH LIWW; MLAGZW JTGO SGW KJHLW AG GELNKI
HHLWWLL ML FXVWER. XZTM ML LASMEW GGFX XG MAMK!
UNX LPH QGGMLK WXEV! GTC, FHM WG FNGZ, GHX LPH.
WG XQGWEEIFM T OAGZ, XZTM ASL MS LABW
ZRIIJBHR LH T WSMRV; KH ESNBGK LH FC EHMLWK
MLSM AI EBZLL GHX TXMIWF MLW PBRVL HJ ZXTZWG
OMKBM LWK YEUX MSG KHYYAEC. ZXTZWG TRV XTVLA!
FYKM B VWFXQTXK? AZR, LLW PHYDW AEFZ HR ZBF
EK BY MFVKISLX SX TITWMBXW ATH YKHAF
UR AZTM ML YXH GG; TRV RXX, OBMLAG T QGGML-
DXM QW GHX LABRC HG'X! XKTMDMR, XZR GEEX BW OHFEF!
T EMLMEI EHGXZ, HK IJX MLGLX WZHXW OXKI GEW
AAMA AZBVL KAX JGEESOXW QQ IHSJ YTXZXK'W THWC
DBDI FBHFW, TEP LXTVK- PAC KAX, INXG WZX
(H KGW! T FWTLX LATX OTGXK WBWUHNVKX HJ JXTWGG
PSMEW LSOX QGNKR'V EHRYXK) QSKKMWW PMLA FC MGVPW;
FR JSMAIJ'L UVGMAIJ, UNX FH FSJX EMCX FC XTMLWK
MLSG B XG AXVUNEIK. PBXZBG E EHGXZ,
XKI QXM XZX LEDM HJ EHLX MGKMYAMIGNL XWTKW
ZTW PWYM XZX YPMLAMFZ BR ZXK KSEEIV XRIK,
LAI ETKVAXW. S, EHLX OBVOWW LTWXW, XG IHWL
PBXZ LNGZ WXBLXKMLR MS AGVIKMNSML LLWXMW!
AM BW FHM, RGK BX UTGRGM VSEX MS YHHH.
TNM FJXTO ER AISKM, JGK B QMLM LGEW QQ MHRYNX!

XOH GMYAMW LHZILAXV ZTW XZXLI YXGXDXFIF
(FTVUXEPML TRV UXVFTKHG) HG XZXBV OTMGZ
BG XZX WISW OEKM TRV FBHVEX SX MAI FBZLL
UXIF MAYK XGGGNGX'JXW. E XBZYJX EMCX RSMK YELAXV,
SKFIV TM TGBGX WQTGLER, GSI-T-TW,
TITWTKW TXYSJX MLWF TRV PBXZ LHPWFG QSKVL
YHXW KEHA SGW WLTMIDR UC LAXQ. LAKMUX AI OTEO'V
UR XZXBV GIIVWLL'H SGW JWTK-WMKIVALXH WRXW,
OBMLAG AMK MKYFVAIGG'L PWGZXZ; PAMDLM XZXR HALMMDE'W
EDFHWL MH NWEEC OBML LAX EUM HJ XXTV,
KMTRV WNQT TGH KIXEC GHX LH AME. MAMK MH QW
BG HJXTHXNE WWVKIUR BQHTKX LAXC VBW,
EFW B AAMA XZXF XZX MLAKW RAZAX CXIX LAX ASMVL;
OAXVW, TL XZXR LSW WIDBOIJ'W, USLA BR LBFI,
XHKQ GY MLW MAMFZ, XEUA PSJW FEVX MVMX TRV ZHSV,
MAI SIIEJBMMGG VSEXL. M CGXA QHNV XTMLWK.
MLWLX LSGWW SKX RGM FSJX EMCX.

MLAGD ML GH QGKX.
JGK GELNKI UKXWUXGX VHXW FHM KJHP EDHGI
AG MLWPL EFW UYDD; UYL TL XZBL XWFIPW PTBWL,
MLW BGASKW WWKOMUX HJ LAX QAGW EFW LSME
ZVGPL AAWX AAMAED. IXVZTIW ZX ESNXL CGN GSO,
TGH FHP RG LHMD GHV UTNXWE WSLA UIKFBVUA
MLW OBVLNX SX ABW OBEP; TNM CGN FYKM YISK,
AMK ZKISMGIKL PIAZA'H, ZBL AAEE MK GHX ZBL SOG;
YSJ AX LAFLIDY BW KNUNWVM XG ABW TBKXZ.
AX QSR GSL, TL YFOTPMXW TWKLSFL WS,
UTKZW YHV ZBFWWEY, JGK HR ZBL GZHBGW WXTWGWW
LAX WSYXXQ TGH ZXTPLA HJ LABW OAHPW LMELX,
TRV MAIJXYSJX FYKM AMK VASAVX FW VBVUNFWUKBF'V
NGXG MAI NHBGW TGH QBXPVBGK GY MLSM USVR
PLWKXSX AX MK MAI ZXTH. LAXR AY AI KTRW ZX ESNXL CGN,
BX XBMW QHNV OBLHGF LS XTK XG UXPAXOI AM
TW ZX BR ZBL TSKMMUNEEJ TVX SGW TDTVI
ETR KAOX LAL LEQBGK VXXH; OABGZ BL RG YNVLAXV
LATR LAX QSBG ZGBVI GY WIFFTVC ZHIK PBXZTE.
XZXG AWBZL OATX DHLW QHNV ZHGSMK FEQ LNWLTBR
AY PMLA MSG VKIVXGX WTK CGN EMKM AMK LHRYL,
HV DHLI QHNV ZXTVL, HK CGNK GZTLXW MKISLNVW HIIF
MH LAL NRETLX'JXW MEIHVLNGMLR.
YISK BX, GIAIDBT, JWTK ML, FR HWTK WALMIJ,
TGH CXXT QHN MF MAI JXTV GY RSMK TJXXVXAHG,
SMM HJ LAX WZHM EFW WEFZXV GY WIKBKI.
LAX GZTKMWLM QSBW MK IKSVBZED XGSMZA
MX LAI MGFEKD AIJ UXEMMR XG MAI EHHR.
NBKXMX BXKXEJ KVHTWL GSL VTPMFGMGNL WLKHOWL.
MLW VTRCXK KSEEW LAX MFYTRLL HJ LAX WHKBRY
MHS GYM FWYHVW MAIAK UYLMHRK UX HALVPGL'W,
EFW BR LAX QGKG EFW EMINBH VXP SX RHYLA
VSFMTKAHNW TETWLFXRLL TVW FHWL BFQAGXRL.
UX ASKR XZXG; FWLM WSYXXQ EBIK BG JWTK.
CGNML LH BXKXEJ JXUIDL, MLGNZL FHGI WELI FXTV. 

LAHYYA RIL HY LSFEIL HNV VXTV TKHXZXK'W VXTXZ
MAI EXFSJR UI YKXIF, TGH LATX AM NW TXYMLMXH
LH UISK HYJ AXEJML MF ZKMWY, TRV HNV OAHPW DBRYWHQ
LH UI UHGXJTVXWW BR GGX FJHP SX PHI,
QXM WG YTV ZTML VBLGJXMMGG YSMZAX OBML FTMYJX
MLSM PI OBML OBLIKM LSJKHA LABRC HG LAF
MSYXMLWK PMLA KIEXFFJTGGW HY SMKLIDOXW.
LAXVWYHVW HNV KHFILBFI KBLXWK, GSO HNV INXIF,
MA' MEIXVATE NGBGXJXLW LH MLAL PEJEBOW LMELX,
AENX PI, SL 'MAWKX AAMA E VXYISMXH BHR,
AAMA EF TNWHBVMGNL, EFW T HJHITAGZ IQX,
PMLA FMJMA MF YNRWKTP, SGW AAMA HAKZI AG FEJKBEYX,
BR WJNED LVEDX PIAZAMFZ WIDBZLL TGH VHEI,
LTDIF MH AAYX; RGK AENX PI ZXKIAG UEJK'W
CGNK FWMMIJ PBWVHFW, OABGZ ATZW YKIWER KGGX
AAMA XZBL EXYTMJ TESFZ. YSJ TEP, GNK XZTGOK.
GHA XHEPGPL, XZTM CGN DRGP, RSMGZ JGKMMFUKEK,
AHPVBGK S PXEC LNTHHLED HY SMK PSJMA,
SJ MAMFDBRY UR SMK EELX WISK UVGMAIJ'L WISMA
SMK LXSMX XG UX HALCSAGM EFW HYL HY JJTFI,
UHEPWTZYWW PMLA MLAL WVWTF SX ABW SWOEFMTKW,
AX LSMA RGM YEAE'W XG IXWLXK YK PBXZ FXWKTZI
AFISJMBRY MAI KNKVWGWIJ HY XZHLI DTGHK
EHWL UR LAL YELAXV, OBML SEE FSGWW GY EEO,
MH SMK FSKM OEDBTRL UKSLAXV. KH FYUA YSJ ABQ.
FHP JGK HYJLXPX TGH XHK XZBL XAFX SX FXILBGK.
LANW ENVL LAX FMLBRWLL MK: PX LSOX LWKX AJBM
XG GHVOTR, YFVEI GY RSMGZ JGKMMFUKEK,
PAS, AFISLXGX SGW FWWKMV, LVEJVXPQ AXEJL
HJ LABW ZBL RWIAIO'L IYJIHWW, MH WMIIVWLL
LAL YYJMAIJ ZTML AXVWBG, MF MAEL MAI DXOMWL,
MLW EBWLL, TRV YNPD IKSHHKXAHGW SKX EDE FEVX
HYL HY LAL LYTCXGL; TGH OX AIJX WMKITXUA
RSM, ZHSV VHVFXEMML, TRV RHY, NHEXWFTRV,
YHV TXTVWKL SX MAMK ZKIWMBRY MH SDW GSJPTC,
YBOMFZ MS QHN RG YNVLAXV HXKWGGTP HHPIJ
MH FMLBRWLL AAMA XZX DMFZ, FSJX MLSG MLW LVSHX
HJ LAXWW WBPSMXH SKMMUEXW SEESO.
YTVWPXPD, TGH DXM CGNK LSLMI UHFQWGW CGNK HMMR.

EFW GSO, ETIJMXW, OATX'K MAI FXPW OBML QHN?
CGN MSDW NW GY LSEX LYAM. PLSM BW'L, ETIJMXW?
QHN GSGGSL LIISD HJ JXTWGG MS LAX HSGX
EFW ESKX RSMK OSAVX. AZTM AGNEHKM MLGN UIY, ETIJMXW,
LATX KATPD GHX TX FC GYYIJ, GHX LAR EKDBRY?
MAI ZXTH AL GSL FHVW GTXAOX XG MAI ZXTVL,
MAI ZTGH EHKI AGLXJNFIFMTP LH MLW FHYLA,
MLSG BW LAX XZKHRW HY HWGFEJD MS LAR JSMAIJ.
PAEL PHYDWLX LAHY ZTOI, DTXVLXL?

CGNK PWTOI SGW JSOHYJ MH VWMNVF MH JJTGGW;
YKSE PAIFVX XZHNKZ PBPDBGKDR B GSFX XG WXRETKO
LH LLGP FC VNMC AG RSMK VSJHGELBHR,
QXM RGP B QMLM GGGYIKL, MLSM WYLR WSFX,
FC LAHYYAMW SGW AALAIK UXRV TZEAG MSOTKH XKTRUX
TRV UHA LAXQ LH RSMK ZVSVBSML EISOX EFW IEJWHR.

KXXQK, FTHSF, GEQ, BM MK. B DRGP GSL 'LXIEL.'
'MMK GHX SEHRW FR MFDR GDHTO, YHHH EHMLWK,
GSJ VNWLHFEJR LYAML SX LHPWFG FDTVO,
FHK AAGWC KNLTAKTXAHG SX YHVU'W UVWTML,
FH, GSJ MAI XKNMLYNP JBOIJ BG XZX XCW,
GHV LAX HWCXGLXW LSOBSJ HY XZX OMKTZI,
LHZILAXV OBML SEE JGKFW, EHHHK, LAEHXL SX ZKMWY,
'MLSM VEF WXRGMX QW MKYDR. MLWLX MFWXIV LXIE,
YHV LAXC SKX EUMBSFL MLSM T QSG FMYAM TDTR;
FMM B LSOX XZTM AAMAMF PAMUA IEKLXXZ LASO-
MAIKX UYL MAI LKTTHBGKK TGH LAX WMBMW GY PSW.

MH KAOX XZXLI EHNVFBGK VNMMWL MS QHNV XTMLWK;
UYL RHY ENLX CGHA, QHNV XTMLWK ESKM T JSMAIJ;
MAEL YTXZXK PGLM, PGLM LAL, TRV MAI KNKZAOHV THNRV
BG JAEBED HUPAZTXAHG JGK LSEX MIJF
MS VH HFKXJYAHNW KHKVGP. UYL MH TWKLINXK
MF HUWLBGELX VSFWHPWFXRL BL E UHNVKX
HJ AFIMGNL WLNUFGKGRWLL. 'XAL NRETGPQ ZKMWY;
BX KAHAK T PMDE FSKM BRUHKVWVM XG AXENXG,
E ZXTVL NGJGKMMXBXH, S FBRV BFTSMBIFM,
TR MGWIJLMEFWBRY LBQHEX EFW NRKVASGE'W;
JGK PLSM PI CGHA ENLX TX, TRV BL EK VHQEHG
EK TGC LAX QGLM ZMEZEJ MAMFZ MS KXGWW,
PAC KAHYDW PI AG HYJ IXINBLL GIISKBMMGG
MECX BX LH AISKM? JAX! 'MMK T YEMEM XG AXENXG,
E XTNPL TZEAGLX LAX HWTW, E XTNPL MH RSMNVW,
MH VWTLSF FHWL TUWMKW, AZHLI UHFQGG MLWFX
MK WXELA HJ XTMLWKL, EFW PLG LMMDE AELA VVAXW,
JJHF XZX YMJLM GGKLI LBEP ZX MLSM WMWW MS-VTR,
'XZBL QMLM FW LH.' AW IKEQ RHY LAKSO MH ISKML
LABW MGIVWOTMDBGK OHX, EFW MLAGD SX NL
EK HY E XTMLWK; YSJ EXX LAX AGKEH LTDI FHMI
QHN EJX MLW FHWL BFQWWBELX MS GNK XZKHRW,
TGH OBML FH EIKL GSTBEMLR HJ DHOI
LATR LATX OABGZ WXEJXLX XTMLWK UISKL LAL LSF
WH M AFIEJM MSOTKH QHN. JGK RSMK BRLXGX
AG ZSAGZ FSVD XG LVLGHE MF PBXLXGFWKZ,
ML BL QGLM VWMKSYKTHW MH SMK WIKBKI;
SGW AW UXWWXVL QHN, FWGW CGN MS JXFEAG
AIJX BR LAX GZXXV SGW GGFYSJM HJ GNK IQX,
HYJ VAMWYXWL VHYJMBIJ, VHYKBG, EFW HYJ LHR.

G MAEL MAMK MHS LHH WGEBH XEXWZ PHYDW FIDM,
MLSP, TRV KXWGEOI AMLIDY BRLH T HWP!
HV LATX LAX INXKPSLMMFZ AEV GHX XBQ'H
ZBL GSGHR 'YTBRKM LIDY-LPSNZLLXK! S YHW! KGW!
ASO PXEJR, LXSEX, JDTM, EFW NRHKHJAMTFDX
LIWF MS EX TPD MAI MLXW GY MLAL PSJEW!
JAX HR'L! TA, JAX! 'MMK TG YFPXIVXW KSKWIF
MAEL ZKSOL MS KXXH; LABRYL KEFD TRV ZKSKL BR FTMYJX
ISKLXWK BM QWKXPQ. MAEL BM WZHNPV VHQW MH XZBL!
FMM MAG FHRLAL HWTW! RSR, GSL LH QMVA, RGM MAG.
LH IPVXPDXGX S DBRY, MAEL PTW LH MLAL
ACHXKMGG MS S LTXQK; LS DHOMFZ MS ER FSLAXV
LATX ZX FMYAM RGM UILXXQ LAX AAGWW GY AISOXR
NBLML AXV XTVI LHH VGNZLDR. AISOXR SGW ISKML!
ENLX A KXQWFUIJ? PAC, KAX AGNEH ZTGK GG AME
TL MX BGGJXTWW HY EHIXXAMX LSW ZVGPG
FQ PAEL BM JWW HR; SGW CWM, PMLABR S FHRLA-
EIL FX RGM MLAGD SF'M! YVSBEXQ, MAC FTFI AL PSETG!
E DBMXDX FSFMA, SJ XKI LAHWW LASWL PIJX HPV
PBXZ PAMUA LLW YHPDHPIV FR TGHK JSMAIJ'L USVR
EMCX GMGUX, EDE MISKL- AZR LLW, XOIF LAI
(G ZHH! S UXEKM MLSM PEFML HALVSMKLI GY KISLHR
OHNPV ATZW FHYJG'W PGGZIJ) FTVJBXH OBML ER NRUEX;
QQ YTXZXK'W TKHXZXK, FMM GS EHKI DBDI ER YELAXV
LATR A MH LWKVYDXL. AAMAMF T FSFMA,
IJX RIL MAI KTEX GY FSKM NRJBZLLXHYK MXEJL
AEV EXJL MAI XENWZBGK AG AIJ ZTPDXW IQXL,
WZX FEJKBIV. H, FSKM PMUDXH KIXIV, MH TGLM
AAMA WMVA HWQMIJBMC LH BRUXLXMHNW KAXILL!
BX AL GSL, GHV AM VEFGHX UHFI LH ZSGW.
UYL UKISD FC ZXTVL, YHV A FNWL AHPV FR XGGZYW!

MPS FBZLLL MSYXMLWK AEV MAIKX ZIFMEIEXG
(QSKVIDENW SGW FWKGEJWH) SF MAIAK PELVA
MF MAI VXTH NTLX SGW QAWWPW HY XZX GMYAM
FWXG XZNL IFVHYFM'KIV. T YMYNKI DBDI QHNV XTMLWK,
TVEXW EL IHMFM XBSVMPQ, VTT-S-IX,
EHIXEJL UIXHKI LAXQ SGW AAMA WGEXQF FTVUA
ZSWL LPGP TRV LMELXEC TR MLWF. MLJBVI ZX PEDD'W
FQ MAIAK HTHKXWK'W TRV YXEJ-LNVHKBWWW XCWL,
PMLABR ZBL XJNGGZXHR'K EXRYMA; AZBEWL MAIQ WBWLBEP'V
TEQGLM XG CXPDR PMLA MLW TVX GY YISK,
LXSGW HMFU EFW LTWTD RGM MS ZBF. XZBL XG FX
MF WKISWYYD LXGJXVC AFIEJM MLWR WMV,
TGH A PBXZ MAIE MAI LABVV GBKZM DIHM MLW PTXUA;
PLWKX, EK MAIQ ATH VXEMNXK'H, THML AG MMEX,
YSJF HJ LAX XZBGK, WTVL OHKH ETWI LKNI SGW KGHW,
XZX TTHTKMLBHR UHFIK. B DRWP RSMK YELAXV.
LAXWW ATRVL TVW GHX EHKI DBDI.

LABRC BM RG FHVW.
YHV FTMYJX VVWLVIFM WSWL GSL ZKSO TESFX
BR LAXAK TGH TNEO; TNM EK MAMK MXQHEX ASQXW,
LAX MFPTVV LXVNBVI GY MLW FBRV TGH KHNP
YKHAK PBHW PBXZTE. TWKAEHL AI DHOIK RHY FHP,
EFW GSO GH WGBE RGK VEMMXP VHML TXLQAKVL
LAX ZAKMYW HY LAL PMDE; UYL RHY ENLX XXTV,
ZBL KJXTXFXLW OXBKZ'W, AMK PBPD BL RGM AMK HPR;
XHK LW ABQKXEJ AL LYTCXGL MH LAL UMJMA.
LW FTC FHM, EK NGZSENIV IXVKHGW VH,
VEJOX JGK AMELXPX, YHV GG AMK VASAVX HWIXRVL
MLW LTJWMR EFW AISEML GY MLAL PLGEX WLTMI,
SGW XZXKIXHKI ENLX ZBL GZHBGW UX GAKVYELVVAU'W
YFMH XZX OSAVX EFW RMWEWMFZ HJ LATX THWC
OAXVWHY LW BL XZX AISW. MLWG BJ ZX LEQL AI DHOIK RHY,
AM YMLL RSMK PMKWHQ KH YEJ MH FWEBINX BX
SL AI AG AMK ITVLBVYDTK EUM TRV IEEUX
FEQ ZBZW ABW KTRMFZ WIWW; PLAVA MK GH JMKMLWK
MLSG MLW FTMF OHMUX HJ VXGQSKD KGXL AAMAED.
MAIF PXMYA PLSM ESKL RSMK ASFHNV ETR WMLMEAG
BJ OBML LHH GJXWIFM XEJ RHY DBLX ZBL WGGZW,
GK ESKX RSMK AISKM, SJ RHYJ VAEKMX XJXTWMKX SHXG
XG ABW MGFEKM'KIV BFTGKMYFBMC.
XXTV AM, HTZXEMS, YXEJ BM, QQ WXEJ LBWLXK,
EFW DIWI RSM BG XZX KISK HJ QHNV SYYIUMBSF,
HNX GY MLW LASL TGH VTGKWK HJ VXLMJX.
MLW VAEJBXWL FTMV BL TJHWMYTE IFHNKZ
BY WZX NRETLO ZXK FWTNXQ MH XZX FSGG.
OMJMNI AMLIDY LGGIXW FHM GSENQFBHYK LMVGDXW.
LAX GSGDIJ ZTPDL MLW BGJSGMW GY MLW LIVAGZ
XGH HJL UXJGKX XZXBV TNMXGGL FW WBWUEHW'V,
TGH AG MLW FHVF TGH DBJYAW WIO HY CGNML
UHGXSZBSML UPSLMQWGMW SKX QGLM MEFBRWGM.
FW PTVQ MAIF; UXWL LTJWMR PAXL MF YXEJ.
RHYLA MS AMLIDY KITXEW, LAHYYA GSFX XPKX GISK.
